entry.title: The Sky That Loved the Night.
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,955Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 12

Summary: He was the night. Silent. Guarded. Cold.Clark was everything else — warmth, hope, the kind of love that could burn through a thousand layers of armor.When Superman confesses his love, Batman turns away, convinced some hearts aren't meant to be held. Months pass. Words are never said. And then the world ends — and Clark dies saving it.Now Bruce stands at his grave, finally ready to speak the truth… but the only person who ever needed to hear it is already gone."I loved you so much I couldn’t breathe near you.And now you’re gone.You died thinking I didn’t."
